marginalia.translation: All good things from a living fount.

position.marginalia_text: Omnes nuga[e] hominu[m], pra[e]ter paucissimos serios uiros;
solidè, efficaciterq[ue] Hoc agentes. Unicus mundi Technologus, et Technopragmaticus.

marginalia.translation: All the trifles of mankind are irrelevant to those very few earnest men, who firmly and effectively do This Thing. The only Technologus and Technopragmaticus of the world.

position.marginalia_text: Radicalis scientia. { In tuis, Entelechia. In alienis, Ironia. s[upr]a, i[nfr]a.

marginalia.translation: Radical wisdom. { In your own matters, Actualization. In others' matters, Irony. Above, below.

position.marginalia_text: Paucissimis cognita vel Methodus, vel praxis Optima.

marginalia.translation: Either a method or a great praxis is known to very few.
The ironism of a singular man.

position.marginalia_text: ( Frustra cognita, qua[e] non fiunt nauiter.

marginalia.translation: Those things which are not done diligently have been learned in vain.

position.marginalia_text: Patere omnes, et omnia festiuissimè: et Propria persequere instantissimè.

marginalia.translation: Suffer all men and all things most humorously, and pursue your own matters most eagerly.

position.marginalia_text: Puerilis ingenij est, vnq[uam] deficere in dictis: puerilis animi est, vnq[uam] deficere in factis. Is tantùm vir est, qui nec dictis, nec factis vnq[uam] deficit.

marginalia.translation: He who falters in speaking is childish in his abilities; he who falters in acting is childish of will. He who does not falter in either speaking or acting is indeed a man.

position.marginalia_text: Omnia Animi, Corporis, Fortuna[e] bona; diuinitùs haurienda è Viuo fonte natura[e], Artis, Exercitationis. Tandemq[ue] summa actione comparanda Summa omnia.

marginalia.translation: All good things of mind, body and fortune must be drawn from the living fount of nature, art, and exercise. And in the end, all of the highest things must be united with the highest action.
